name: @ffk/onboarding
description: Fleet of the Faithful Knights Onboarding Server

scripts.docker-run: docker run -i --net='host' -e FFK_DISCORD_CLIENT_SECRET=$FFK_DISCORD_CLIENT_SECRET -e FFK_DISCORD_RECIRECT=$FF_DISCORD_REDIRECT -e FFK_DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN=$FFK_DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN -e FFK_API_SERVER=$FFK_API_SERVER ffkcontainerregistry.azurecr.io/onboarding.faithfulknights.com:$(git rev-parse --verify HEAD)
scripts.docker-publish: docker push ffkcontainerregistry.azurecr.io/onboarding.faithfulknights.com:$(git rev-parse --verify HEAD) && docker push ffkcontainerregistry.azurecr.io/onboarding.faithfulknights.com:latest

author: Keanu Ashwell
